segments.text: I'd like you to do me a favor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you mail this at the post office for me ? I have to go to the doctor for an appointment and I don't have enough time to go to the post office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . And I'd like you to get some cold medicine for me when you go to the doctor's .
segments.speaker: S2
